00020     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class event_generator: public MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type>,
00021                                                                                                  public ps_generator_base<model_t>,
00022                                                                                                  public phase_space_cut,
00023                                                                                                  public scale_expression<typename model_t::value_type>
00024     {
00025         typedef MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type> base_type;

00031             typedef model_t model_type;
00032             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00033             typedef typename get_spacetime_type<model_t>::type spacetime_type;
00034             typedef vector<value_type,spacetime_type::dimension> momentum_type;
00035             typedef typename momentum_type::size_type size_type;
00036             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00037             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00038             typedef typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator CM_tree_iterator;
00039             typedef process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> process_generator_type;
00040             typedef std::vector<process_generator_type*> process_container;
00041             typedef typename process_container::iterator process_iterator;
00042             typedef typename process_container::const_iterator const_process_iterator;
00043             typedef typename process_generator_type::ps_generator_type ps_generator_type;
00044             typedef typename process_generator_type::helicity_generator_type helicity_generator_type;

00053 
00054             static bool xsec_less(const process_generator_type* proc1,const process_generator_type* proc2)
00055             {
00056                 return proc1->cross_section().value<proc2->cross_section().value;
00057             }
00058 
00060 
00061             static bool xsec_more(const process_generator_type* proc1,const process_generator_type* proc2)
00062             {
00063                 return proc1->cross_section().value>=proc2->cross_section().value;
00064             }
00065 
00067 
00068             static bool alpha_less(const process_generator_type* proc1,const process_generator_type* proc2)
00069             {
00070                 return proc1->alpha<proc2->alpha;
00071             }
00072 
00074 
00075             static bool alpha_more(const process_generator_type* proc1,const process_generator_type* proc2)
00076             {
00077                 return proc1->alpha>proc2->alpha;
00078             }

00082             
00083             static event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,std::istream& is)
00084             {
00085                 if(algo.n_trees()==0)
00086                 {
00087                     LOG(warning)<<"Event generator requested for empty process list...returning NULL..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00088                     return NULL;
00089                 }
00090                 event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* result=new event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>(algo,false);
00091                 std::string line;
00092                 while(line!="<evtgen>" and !is.eof())
00093                 {
00094                     std::getline(is,line);
00095                 }
00096                 if(is.eof())
00097                 {
00098                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before event generator flag was read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00099                     return NULL;
00100                 }
00101                 result->load(is);
00102                 while(line!="<procgen>" and !is.eof())
00103                 {
00104                     std::getline(is,line);
00105                 }
00106                 if(is.eof())
00107                 {
00108                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before first process flag was read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00109                     return NULL;
00110                 }
00111                 process_generator_type* p;
00112                 while(line=="<procgen>" and !is.eof())
00113                 {
00114                     p=process_generator_type::create_instance_noflags(algo,is,false);
00115                     if(p!=NULL)
00116                     {
00117                         result->procs.push_back(p);
00118                     }
00119                     while(line!="</procgen>" and !is.eof())
00120                     {
00121                         std::getline(is,line);
00122                     }
00123                     std::getline(is,line);
00124                 }
00125                 std::sort(result->procs.begin(),result->procs.end(),alpha_more);
00126                 if(result->procs.size()!=0)
00127                 {
00128                     result->sub_proc=result->procs.begin();
00129                 }
00130                 else
00131                 {
00132                     result->sub_proc=result->procs.end();
00133                 }
00134                 return result;
00135             }
00136 
00139             
00140             static event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,const std::string& filename)
00141             {
00142                 std::ifstream ifs;
00143                 ifs.open(filename.c_str());
00144                 if(!ifs.is_open())
00145                 {
00146                     LOG(warning)<<"Error opening input file "<<filename<<"... returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00147                     return NULL;
00148                 }
00149                 return read(algo,ifs);
00150             }

00154             
00155             static event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,generator_configuration<model_t>& settings,std::istream& is)
00156             {
00157                 if(algo.n_trees()==0)
00158                 {
00159                     LOG(warning)<<"Event generator requested for empty process list...returning NULL..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00160                     return NULL;
00161                 }
00162                 event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* result=new event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>(algo,false);
00163                 std::string line;
00164                 while(line!="<evtgen>" and !is.eof())
00165                 {
00166                     std::getline(is,line);
00167                 }
00168                 if(is.eof())
00169                 {
00170                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before event generator flag was read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00171                     return NULL;
00172                 }
00173                 result->load(is);
00174                 while(line!="<procgen>" and !is.eof())
00175                 {
00176                     std::getline(is,line);
00177                 }
00178                 if(is.eof())
00179                 {
00180                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before first process flag was read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00181                     return NULL;
00182                 }
00183                 process_generator_type* p;
00184                 while(line=="<procgen>" and !is.eof())
00185                 {
00186                     p=process_generator_type::create_instance_noflags(algo,is,false);
00187                     if(p!=NULL)
00188                     {
00189                         p->insert_cut(&settings);
00190                         p->insert_scale(&settings);
00191                         result->procs.push_back(p);
00192                     }
00193                     while(line!="</procgen>" and !is.eof())
00194                     {
00195                         std::getline(is,line);
00196                     }
00197                     std::getline(is,line);
00198                 }
00199                 std::sort(result->procs.begin(),result->procs.end(),alpha_more);
00200                 if(result->procs.size()!=0)
00201                 {
00202                     result->sub_proc=result->procs.begin();
00203                 }
00204                 else
00205                 {
00206                     result->sub_proc=result->procs.end();
00207                 }
00208                 settings.lock_generator(result);
00209                 result->ps_cut=&settings;
00210                 result->scale=&settings;
00211                 return result;
00212             }

00218             static event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,generator_configuration<model_t>& settings,const std::string& filename)
00219             {
00220                 std::ifstream ifs;
00221                 ifs.open(filename.c_str());
00222                 if(!ifs.is_open())
00223                 {
00224                     LOG(warning)<<"Error opening input file "<<filename<<"... returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00225                     return NULL;
00226                 }
00227                 return read(algo,settings,ifs);
00228             }

00234 
00235             event_generator(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo):algorithm(algo),update_counter(0),auto_update(false),auto_proc_adapt(0),ps_cut(NULL),scale(NULL),subproc_params(1,0)
00236             {
00237                 procs.reserve(algorithm.n_trees());
00238                 init();
00239                 for(sub_proc=procs.begin();sub_proc!=procs.end();++sub_proc)
00240                 {
00241                     (*sub_proc)->configure();
00242                 }
00243                 if(auto_subprocess_adapt())
00244                 {
00245                     set_auto_proc_adapt(auto_subprocess_batch());
00246                 }
00247                 subproc_params.first=subprocess_adaptivity();
00248                 subproc_params.second=subprocess_threshold();
00249             }
00250 
00252 
00253             event_generator(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,generator_configuration<model_t>& settings):algorithm(algo),update_counter(0),auto_update(false),auto_proc_adapt(0),ps_cut(NULL),scale(NULL),subproc_params(1,0)
00254             {
00255                 procs.reserve(algorithm.n_trees());
00256                 init();
00257                 for(sub_proc=procs.begin();sub_proc!=procs.end();++sub_proc)
00258                 {
00259                     settings.set_generator(*sub_proc);
00260                     basic_cuts::clear();
00261                     settings.configure();
00262                     (*sub_proc)->configure();
00263                     (*sub_proc)->insert_scale(&settings);
00264                     (*sub_proc)->insert_cut(&settings);
00265                 }
00266                 sub_proc=procs.begin();
00267                 settings.lock_generator(this);
00268                 settings.configure();
00269                 if(auto_subprocess_adapt())
00270                 {
00271                     set_auto_proc_adapt(auto_subprocess_batch());
00272                 }
00273                 subproc_params.first=subprocess_adaptivity();
00274                 subproc_params.second=subprocess_threshold();
00275             }

00280             void pre_initialise(bool verbose=false)
00281             {
00282                 for(sub_proc=procs.begin();sub_proc!=procs.end();++sub_proc)
00283                 {
00284                     (*sub_proc)->pre_initialise(verbose);
00285                 }
00286                 refresh_xsec();
00287                 adapt_processes();
00288             }
00289 
00291 
00292             void initialise(bool verbose=false)
00293             {
00294                 for(sub_proc=procs.begin();sub_proc!=procs.end();++sub_proc)
00295                 {
00296                     if(verbose)
00297                     {
00298                         std::stringstream ss;
00299                         (*sub_proc)->print_process(ss);
00300                         std::cout<<std::endl<<"init subprocess "<<ss.str()<<std::endl;
00301                     }
00302                     (*sub_proc)->initialise(verbose);
00303                     loop_process(subprocess_events(),verbose);
00304                 }
00305                 refresh_xsec();
00306                 adapt_processes();
00307             }
00308

00311             void initialise(generator_configuration<model_t>& settings,bool verbose=false)
00312             {
00313                 for(sub_proc=procs.begin();sub_proc!=procs.end();++sub_proc)
00314                 {
00315                     if(verbose)
00316                     {
00317                         std::stringstream ss;
00318                         (*sub_proc)->print_process(ss);
00319                         std::cout<<std::endl<<"init subprocess "<<ss.str()<<std::endl;
00320                     }
00321                     settings.configure();
00322                     (*sub_proc)->initialise(verbose);
00323                     loop_process(subprocess_events(),verbose);
00324                 }
00325                 refresh_xsec();
00326                 adapt_processes();

00331             void initialise(size_type channel_iters,size_type channel_batch,size_type grid_iters,size_type grid_batch,size_type sub_proc_evts,bool verbose=false)
00332             {
00333                 for(sub_proc=procs.begin();sub_proc!=procs.end();++sub_proc)
00334                 {
00335                     if(verbose)
00336                     {
00337                         std::stringstream ss;
00338                         (*sub_proc)->print_process(ss);
00339                         std::cout<<std::endl<<ss.str()<<std::endl;
00340                     }
00341                     (*sub_proc)->initialise(channel_iters,channel_batch,grid_iters,grid_batch,verbose);
00342                     loop_process(sub_proc_evts,verbose);
00343                 }
00344                 refresh_xsec();
00345                 adapt_processes();
00346             }

00350             virtual ~event_generator()
00351             {

00353                 {
00354                     delete procs[i];

00363             bool set_beam_energy(int n,const value_type& E)
00364             {
00365                 bool q=true;
00366                 for(size_type i=0;i<procs.size();++i)
00367                 {
00368                     q&=(procs[i]->set_beam_energy(n,E));
00369                 }
00370                 return q;
00371             }

00476             
00477             bool generate()
00478             {
00479                 if(procs.size()==0)
00480                 {
00481                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00482                     return false;
00483                 }
00484                 value_type rho=rn_stream::throw_number();
00485                 sub_proc=procs.begin();
00486                 value_type r(0);
00487                 while(r<rho and sub_proc!=procs.end())
00488                 {
00489                     r+=(*sub_proc)->alpha;
00490                     ++sub_proc;
00491                 }
00492                 --sub_proc;
00493                 if(sub_proc==procs.end())
00494                 {
00495                     LOG(warning)<<"subprocess iterator overflow detected...no generation performed."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00496                     return false;
00497                 }
00498                 bool q=(*sub_proc)->generate();
00499                 this->integrand()=(*sub_proc)->integrand();
00500                 this->weight()=(*sub_proc)->weight()/(*sub_proc)->alpha;
00501                 if(update_counter!=0 and auto_proc_adapt!=0 and update_counter%auto_proc_adapt==0)
00502                 {
00503                     adapt_processes();
00504                 }
00505                 this->up_to_date=false;
00506                 return q;
00507             }
00508 
00510 
00511             void generate_unweighted(bool verbose=false)
00512             {
00513                 value_type rho=rn_stream::throw_number(0,this->cross_section().value);
00514                 sub_proc=procs.begin();
00515                 value_type r(0);
00516                 while(r<rho and sub_proc!=procs.end())
00517                 {
00518                     r+=((*sub_proc)->cross_section().value);
00519                     ++sub_proc;
00520                 }
00521                 --sub_proc;
00522                 if(sub_proc==procs.end())
00523                 {
00524                     LOG(warning)<<"Subprocesses iterator overflow detected...no generation performed."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00525                     return;
00526                 }
00527                 (*sub_proc)->generate_unweighted(verbose);
00528                 if(update_counter!=0 and auto_proc_adapt!=0 and update_counter%auto_proc_adapt==0)
00529                 {
00530                     adapt_processes();
00531                 }
00532                 this->up_to_date=false;
00533             }
00534 
00536 
00537             bool pass()
00538             {
00539                 return (sub_proc==procs.end())?false:((*sub_proc)->pass()); 
00540             }
00541 
00543 
00544             void reset()
00545             {
00546                 for(process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
00547                 {
00548                     (*it)->reset();
00549                     (*it)->alpha=(value_type)1/procs.size();
00550                 }
00551                 this->n_calls=0;
00552                 this->integral.value=(value_type)0;
00553                 this->integral.error=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00554                 this->integral.error_error=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00555                 this->up_to_date=true;
00556                 update_counter=0;
00557             }

00644 
00645             void adapt()
00646             {
00647                 for(process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
00648                 {
00649                     (*it)->adapt();
00650                 }
00651                 adapt_processes();
00652             }
00653 
00657 
00658             void adapt_processes()
00659             {
00660                 value_type p=process_adaptivity();
00661                 value_type norm(0);
00662                 MC_integral<value_type>proc_xsec;
00663                 value_type sigma=cross_section().value;
00664                 value_type q=process_threshold()*sigma/procs.size();
00665                 for(process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
00666                 {
00667                     proc_xsec=(*it)->cross_section();
00668                     if((proc_xsec.value+proc_xsec.error)>q)
00669                     {
00670                         (*it)->alpha=std::pow((*it)->cross_section().error,p);
00671                         norm+=(*it)->alpha;
00672                     }
00673                     else
00674                     {
00675                         std::cout<<"deleting process with xsec "<<proc_xsec<<" smaller than "<<q<<std::endl;
00676                         (*it)->alpha=(value_type)0;
00677                     }
00678                 }
00679                 for(process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
00680                 {
00681                     (*it)->alpha/=norm;
00682                 }
00683                 std::sort(procs.begin(),procs.end(),alpha_more);
00684                 process_iterator it=procs.begin();
00685                 while(it!=procs.end() and (*it)->alpha!=(value_type)0)
00686                 {
00687                     ++it;
00688                 }
00689                 if(it==procs.end() or it==procs.begin())
00690                 {
00691                     return;
00692                 }
00693                 std::size_t newsize=it-procs.begin();
00694                 process_iterator it2;
00695                 while(it!=procs.end())
00696                 {
00697                     algorithm.set_process((*it)->amplitude);
00698                     algorithm.remove_process();
00699                     delete (*it);
00700                     ++it;
00701                 }
00702                 procs.resize(newsize);
00703                 sub_proc=procs.begin();
00704             }
00705

00708             const weight_histogrammer<value_type>* bin_weights(size_type bins)
00709             {
00710                 for(process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
00711                 {
00712                     (*it)->bin_weights(bins);
00713                 }
00714                 return NULL;
00715             }

00718 
00719             value_type reduce_max_weight(const value_type& eps_)
00720             {
00721                 for(process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
00722                 {
00723                     (*it)->base_type::reduce_max_weight(eps_);
00724                 }
00725                 return 0;
00726             }

00732 
00733             MC_integral<value_type> cross_section() const
00734             {
00735                 if(this->up_to_date)
00736                 {
00737                     return this->integral;
00738                 }
00739                 refresh_xsec();
00740                 return this->integral;
00741             }

01006 
01008 
01009             std::ostream& print_cross_sections(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01010             {
01011                 for(const_process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
01012                 {
01013                     std::stringstream ss;
01014                     (*it)->print_process(ss);
01015                     os<<std::setw(60)<<ss.str();
01016                     os<<std::setw(15)<<(*it)->cross_section().value;
01017                     os<<std::setw(15)<<(*it)->cross_section().error;
01018                     os<<std::setw(15)<<(*it)->cross_section().error_error;
01019                     os<<std::setw(15)<<(*it)->alpha;
01020                     os<<std::setw(10)<<(*it)->calls()<<std::endl;
01021                 }
01022                 os<<"--------------------------------------------------------------------------"<<std::endl;
01023                 os<<"Total: "<<cross_section()<<std::endl;
01024                 return os;
01025             }
01026 
01028             
01029             std::ostream& print_status(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01030             {
01031                 size_type evt_counter=0,pos_evt_counter=0,calls=0,grid_adaptations=0,channel_adaptations=0;
01032                 value_type efficiency;
01033                 for(const_process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
01034                 {
01035                     evt_counter+=((*it)->evt_counter);
01036                     pos_evt_counter+=((*it)->pos_evt_counter);
01037                     calls+=((*it)->calls());
01038                     grid_adaptations+=((*it)->grid_adaptations);
01039                     channel_adaptations+=((*it)->channel_adaptations);
01040                     efficiency+=((*it)->efficiency()/procs.size());
01041                 }
01042                 os<<"###############################################################################################"<<std::endl;
01043                 os<<"Nr of subprocesses:                                "<<std::scientific<<procs.size()<<std::endl;
01044                 os<<"Nr of events generated:                            "<<std::scientific<<evt_counter<<std::endl;
01045                 os<<"Nr of positive weight events generated:            "<<std::scientific<<pos_evt_counter<<std::endl;
01046                 os<<"Nr of events contributing to cross-section:        "<<std::scientific<<calls<<std::endl;
01047                 os<<"Nr of updates performed:                           "<<std::scientific<<update_counter<<std::endl;
01048                 os<<"Nr of grid adaptations performed:                  "<<std::scientific<<grid_adaptations<<std::endl;
01049                 os<<"Nr of channel adaptations performed:               "<<std::scientific<<channel_adaptations<<std::endl;
01050                 os<<"Mean Monte Carlo efficiency (%):                   "<<std::scientific<<efficiency<<std::endl;
01051                 os<<"Cross section (pb):                                "<<std::scientific<<cross_section()<<std::endl;
01052                 os<<"###############################################################################################"<<std::endl;
01053             }
01054 
01056 
01057             std::ostream& print_cuts(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01058             {
01059                 return (ps_cut==NULL)?os:(ps_cut->print(os));
01060             }
01061 
01063 
01064             std::ostream& print_settings(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01065             {
01066                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"Nr of subprocesses:"<<procs.size()<<std::endl;
01067                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"auto-updates:"<<(auto_update?"yes":"no")<<std::endl;
01068                 if(auto_update)
01069                 {
01070                     os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"auto-adapt batch size:"<<auto_proc_adapt<<std::endl;
01071                 }
01072                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"process adaptivity:"<<subprocess_adaptivity()<<std::endl;
01073                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"process xsec threshold:"<<subprocess_threshold()<<std::endl;
01074                 os<<"..........................."<<std::endl;
01075                 os<<"Subprocess settings:       "<<std::endl;
01076                 os<<"..........................."<<std::endl;
01077                 if(procs.size()==0)
01078                 {
01079                     os<<"no subprocesses"<<std::endl;
01080                 }
01081                 else
01082                 {
01083                     (*(procs.begin()))->print_settings(os);
01084                 }
01085                 return os;
01086             }
01087 
01089 
01090             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
01091             {
01092                 this->base_type::load(is);
01093                 is>>update_counter>>auto_update>>auto_proc_adapt>>subproc_params.first>>subproc_params.second;
01094                 return is;
01095             }
01096 
01098 
01099             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
01100             {
01101                 os<<"<evtgen>"<<std::endl;
01102                 this->base_type::save(os);
01103                 os<<update_counter<<"\t"<<auto_update<<"\t"<<auto_proc_adapt<<"\t"<<subproc_params.first<<"\t"<<subproc_params.second<<std::endl;
01104                 for(const_process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
01105                 {
01106                     (*it)->save(os);
01107                 }
01108                 os<<"</evtgen>"<<std::endl;
01109                 return os;
01110             }
01111 
01113 
01114             bool write(const std::string& filename) const
01115             {
01116                 std::ofstream ofs;
01117                 ofs.open(filename.c_str());
01118                 if(!ofs.is_open())
01119                 {
01120                     LOG(warning)<<"Error opening output file "<<filename<<"..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
01121                     return false;
01122                 }
01123                 save(ofs);
01124                 ofs.close();
01125                 return true;
01126             }

01128         protected:
01129 
01131 
01132             CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algorithm;
01133 
01134         private:
01135 
01136             /* Subprocess generators: */
01137 
01138             process_container procs;
01139 
01140             /* Subprocess iterator: */
01141 
01142             process_iterator sub_proc;
01143 
01144             /* Counts the number of updates since an adapt() call: */
01145 
01146             size_type update_counter;
01147 
01148             /* Automatic update flag: */
01149 
01150             bool auto_update;
01151 
01152             /* Automatic process channel adaptation flag: */
01153 
01154             size_type auto_proc_adapt;
01155 
01156             /* Phase space cut: */
01157 
01158             phase_space_cut* ps_cut;
01159 
01160             /* QCD scale expression object: */
01161 
01162             scale_expression<value_type>* scale;
01163 
01164             /* Subprocess adaptation parameters: */
01165 
01166             std::pair<value_type,value_type> subproc_params;
01167 
01168             /* Private constructor: */
01169             
01170             event_generator(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,bool alloc):algorithm(algo),update_counter(0),auto_update(false),auto_proc_adapt(0),ps_cut(NULL),scale(NULL),subproc_params(1,0)
01171             {
01172                 procs.reserve(algorithm.n_trees());
01173                 if(alloc)
01174                 {
01175                     init();
01176                 }
01177                 else
01178                 {
01179                     sub_proc=procs.end();
01180                 }
01181             }
01182 
01183             /* Constructor helper function: */
01184 
01185             void init()
01186             {
01187                 if(algorithm.reset_process())
01188                 {
01189                     size_type id=0;
01190                     do
01191                     {
01192                         if(!algorithm.get_tree_iterator()->is_empty())
01193                         {
01194                             procs.push_back(new process_generator_type(algorithm.get_tree_iterator(),id));
01195                             ++id;
01196                         }
01197                     }
01198                     while(algorithm.next_process());
01199                     if(procs.size()!=0)
01200                     {
01201                         value_type alpha=(value_type)1/(value_type)procs.size();
01202                         for(size_type i=0;i<procs.size();++i)
01203                         {
01204                             procs[i]->alpha=alpha;
01205                         }
01206                         sub_proc=procs.begin();
01207                     }
01208                     else
01209                     {
01210                         sub_proc=procs.end();
01211                     }
01212                 }
01213                 else
01214                 {
01215                     procs.clear();
01216                     sub_proc=procs.end();
01217                 }
01218             }
01219 
01220             /* Helper function for initialisation: */
01221 
01222             void loop_process(size_type sub_proc_evts,bool verbose)
01223             {
01224                 if(verbose)
01225                 {
01226                     std::cout<<"estimating xsec";
01227                     std::cout.flush();
01228                     size_type batch=sub_proc_evts/10;
01229                     for(size_type i=0;i<sub_proc_evts;++i)
01230                     {
01231                         (*sub_proc)->throw_event();
01232                         (*sub_proc)->update();
01233                         (*sub_proc)->refresh_cross_section();
01234                         this->integrand()=(*sub_proc)->integrand();
01235                         this->weight()=(*sub_proc)->weight()/(*sub_proc)->alpha;
01236                         if(i%batch==0)
01237                         {
01238                             std::cout<<'.';
01239                             std::cout.flush();
01240                         }
01241                     }
01242                     std::cout<<"done"<<std::endl;
01243                 }
01244                 else
01245                 {
01246                     for(size_type i=0;i<sub_proc_evts;++i)
01247                     {
01248                         (*sub_proc)->generate();
01249                         (*sub_proc)->update();
01250                         (*sub_proc)->refresh_cross_section();
01251                         this->integrand()=(*sub_proc)->integrand();
01252                         this->weight()=(*sub_proc)->weight()/(*sub_proc)->alpha;
01253                     }
01254                 }
01255                 if(verbose)
01256                 {
01257                     std::cout<<std::setw(15)<<(*sub_proc)->cross_section().value;
01258                     std::cout<<std::setw(15)<<(*sub_proc)->cross_section().error;
01259                     std::cout<<std::setw(15)<<(*sub_proc)->cross_section().error_error;
01260                     std::cout<<std::setw(10)<<(*sub_proc)->calls()<<std::endl;
01261                 }
01262             }
01263 
01264             /* Total cross section refresher method. */
01265 
01266             void refresh_xsec() const
01267             {
01268                 this->integral.value=(value_type)0;
01269                 this->integral.error=(value_type)0;
01270                 this->integral.error_error=(value_type)0;
01271 
01272                 for(const_process_iterator it=procs.begin();it!=procs.end();++it)
01273                 {
01274                     MC_integral<value_type>xsect((*it)->cross_section());
01275                     (this->integral)+=xsect.value;
01276                     this->integral.error+=(xsect.error*xsect.error);
01277                     this->integral.error_error+=(xsect.error_error*xsect.error_error);
01278                 }
01279                 this->integral.error=std::sqrt(this->integral.error);
01280                 this->integral.error_error=std::sqrt(this->integral.error_error);
01281                 this->up_to_date=true;
01282             }
01283     };
01284 }
